title: Thousands of white teenagers crawling into a mall and nobody got caught?
subtitle: There was a major altercation at a commercial centre in Kentucky in 2015, but according to the police the crowd was ethnically mixed and was not arrested because of the age of the participants.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: No one was arrested after thousands of young people had entered into a big fight at a mall in Kentucky because everyone involved was white.
